summary: This document is an email correspondence primarily between Amanda Kirby and Lesley Groff regarding scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey during the week of October 8, 2013. It highlights the coordination efforts among individuals at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting and is in communication with Lesley Groff and Paul Morns regarding scheduling.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is reaching out to Amanda Kirby and Paul Morns to schedule an appointment with Jeffrey.

persons.name: Paul Morns
persons.context: Paul Morns is included in the email correspondence regarding the scheduling of a meeting.

persons.name: Jeffrey
persons.context: Jeffrey is the individual with whom the meeting is being scheduled, though his full name is not provided.

Amanda Kirby is working with Paul Morns to schedule a meeting.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Floor, New York, NY 10154-0004
keyFacts: The email correspondence is dated September 24, 2013.
Amanda Kirby is an Associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
Lesley Groff is involved in scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey.
The meeting is proposed for October 7 or 8, 2013.
The document contains a confidentiality notice.
